casebody.data:
State of Connecticut
v.
Luis Sanchez Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 27, 2016

Susan M. Hankins, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Rocco A. Chiarenza, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn. App. 665, 146 A.3d 344 (2016), is denied.
